projects.title: Circumnavigating the world
projects.description: Set out to circumnavigate the world on a boat with an electric engine powered by solar panels with five other adventurers. Start and end of the journey was Naples, Italy.

technologies.name: Solar cooker
tasks: Use a solar cooker to cook the meals of all crew members.
Use a solar cooker to make tea.

technologies.name: Sextant
tasks: Measure the angle between arbitrary stars and the horizon to find out longitude.

technologies.name: Fishing rod
tasks: Catch fish in the oceans of the world.

achievements: Keep the crew happy with providing warm meals thanks to skillful use of solar cooker.
Reached the planned destination three months earlier than expected by using celestial navigation skills.

projects.title: Waterski down the Rhine
projects.description: Become the first person in history that has waterskied the full length of the river Rhine and produce a documentary about the endavour.

technologies.name: Water Skis
tasks: Carry the skis on my back where the river wasn't skiable.

technologies.name: Fishing rod
tasks: Catch fish using fly fishing technique.

achievements: Successfully became the first person to water ski down the rhine.
Gained one million subscribers on my youtube channel.
